```{r setup}
library(FinalProject)
```

```{r}
  library(readxl)
  library(dplyr)
  library(openintro)

  SurgeryData <- read_excel("../inst/extdata/Medicare_Provider_Charge_Inpatient_DRGALL_FY2014 (1).xlsx", skip = 5)
  
  SurgeryData %>% 
    group_by(`Provider State`) %>%
    summarise(averagePay = mean(`Average Total Payments`)) %>% 
    arrange(desc(averagePay)) %>% 
    mutate(StateName = tolower(abbr2state(`Provider State`))) -> StateVsAvgPay
    
    
```
